iiv.gui

Class EasyAddAbstractAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.AbstractAction
      • iiv.gui.EasyAddAbstractAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.ItemListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.Action
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CNUViewerActions.LocalAction, GotoPointDialog.LocalAction, StatusWindow.LocalAction, VisibleStateButtonUpdate

    public abstract class EasyAddAbstractAction
extends javax.swing.AbstractAction
implements java.awt.event.ItemListener
    This abstract class adds some simple tools to AbstractAction for automatic creation of JComponents with tool tips and Mnemonics.
    Since:
    iiV1.15a
    See Also:
    CNUViewer, AbstractAction, Serialized Form

        public EasyAddAbstractAction(java.lang.String name,
                             java.lang.String toolTip,
                             int Mnemonic,
                             java.lang.String checkboxName)
        Creates a new instance of EasyAddAbstractAction with given button name, tooltip text, Mnemonic, and checkbox name.
        Parameters:
        name - button name
        toolTip - automaticly set as buttons tooltip text when adding
        Mnemonic - automaticly set as buttons Mnemonic
        checkboxName - button name (allows check box to have different name)

      • EasyAddAbstractAction

        public EasyAddAbstractAction(java.lang.String name,
                             java.lang.String toolTip,
                             int Mnemonic,
                             java.lang.String checkboxName,
                             boolean defaultCheckboxState)
        Creates a new instance of EasyAddAbstractAction with given button name, tooltip text, Mnemonic, checkbox name and default checkbox state.
        Parameters:
        name - button name
        toolTip - automaticly set as buttons tooltip text when adding
        Mnemonic - automaticly set as buttons Mnemonic
        checkboxName - button name (allows check box to have different name)
        defaultCheckboxState - default state for self created checkbox models
